location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 9: William Hornby, John Carnac, Charles Egerton and Daniel Draper, Council at Bombay Castle, to [John Beaumont and George Green, Residents at Bushire]

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it would appear to be addressed to John Beaumont and George Green, East India Company officials at Bushire. The letter, received 14 October 1778, via the Eagle,notifies the recipients of the appointment of a Select Committee for transacting all political, military and naval affairs which may require secrecy. The letter includes an extract (listed as no. 10) from the commands of the Court of Directors, with details on the appointment of the Committee, which is composed of William Hornby, John Carnac, Charles Egerton and Daniel Draper.
